perspective_differences.description: How sources emphasize or frame the story differently (focus, tone, context). Can be empty if coverage is similar. Maximum 3 differences.

aspect.description: What aspect differs. Examples: 'Primary focus', 'Tone toward government', 'Context provided'. Maximum 8 words.

approach_a.description: How group A approaches this aspect. Maximum 30 words.

approach_b.description: How group B approaches this aspect differently. Maximum 30 words.
